body:
Today in Justice III I broke a monument with my fist :D

@SWEET_Johny Thanks xD
@StormzInvader Thank you it is a video so I don't know why I didn't put it in the Media category :P

@Spock404 Obsidian can only be mined with a diamond pickaxe if you actually wanna collect it.
